import React, {useState} from 'react'; import { Switch, Route, Link } from "react-router-dom"; import {Tabs, Tab, TabPanel, Modal, Row, Button, Col, Form, Card, TabContent, Container} from 'react-bootstrap'; import 'bootstrap/dist/css/bootstrap.min.css'; import styled from 'styled-components'; import logo from './fashion.jpeg'; import { TextField } from '@material-ui/core'; import * as ApolloReactHooks from '@apollo/client'; import { gql, useMutation } from '@apollo/client'; const GridWrapper = styled.div` display: block; grid-gap: 10px; margin-left: 270px; margin-right: 6em; grid-template-columns: repeat(12, 1fr); grid-auto-rows: minmax(25px, auto); `; const ADD_CLASSIFICATION_MUTATION = gql` mutation createClassification($name: String!, $type: String!, $fabric: String!) { createClassification( input: { name: $name, type: $type, fabric: $fabric } ) { id name type fabric } } `; export const Options = (props) => { let name,type,fabric; const [createClassification] = useMutation(ADD_CLASSIFICATION_MUTATION); return (
{ e.preventDefault(); createClassification ({variables: {name: name.value, type: type.value, fabric: fabric.value}}) }}>
